content.detailedDescription: It was a very cold cloudy afternoon in november 1995 my best friend and i were smoking a cigarette outside talking in my backyard balcony on the third floor duplex in the east end of montreal, and i told him i could not stay any longer outside because it was much too cold. i insisted for him to come inside , but he refused and seem to be in a strange kind of mood as though something was telling him to stay outside and suddenly he shouted and call my name to come outside quickly, he look up and fought he saw at huge dark black bird, but in fact it was all kinds of bright lights red ,orange yellow ...We were amazed could not believe we were looking at the underneath part of the spacecraft as it was passing at a very slow speed above us moving furthur east, and we had a good view of it was a triangle smooth shape gray metallic craft, i would say a mothership it was huge and hovering about 1000 feet above us it was very close to us there were no window that we can see. we saw it for a good 10 mintutes as was moving away from us. we were sure that this event would be on the evening news but nothing was said. i wish i had a camera on that moment.
content.summary: Mother ship

content.detailedDescription:
This morning at approximately 6:25 a.M. i took my dog out. i was standing on the edge of a field next to the property facing east. suddenly i seen two bright lights flying from north to south, at a high speed, probably a couple hundred feet up. the second one was directly behind the first one. i stood there wondering what i just seen, when two more flew by going in the same direction, speed, and height. but the first one was not lit up like the others. instead it had a redish orange light on the front and one on the rear. the one behind it was like the first two that i saw. then about two seconds later i saw another one traveling just like the others except it just went up about 30 degrees and disappeared. 
none of these made any sounds. it was dark out, the weather was fair. visability was good.
content.summary: Took my dog out this morning and saw five ufo's

content.detailedDescription:
The kids just came home from there dads it was about 7:30 pm on wed nite.My daughter was looking for her cat and she was not inside. i opened the front door and began to call the cat,when my eyes were drawn to the south west sky.It was dusk the sun was nearly set and the sky was pink ,there were no stars visible in that part of sky yet ,although in the eastern sky they were just starting to peak out.Above the tree line there it was, it was pillar shaped ,up and down , it was absolutely positively not a plane or any thing i have ever seen in the sky before. the whole object was a vibrant yet soft glowey orange. from the top, about a third way down were flashes of blue and light green lights  going in sequence with an occasioned red one. they did not flash or blink ,they seemed to be just going on and off around the object
again not in a blinky type fashion . i immediately got my boy friend ,and i said to him what is that? he was quite, it was stationary for some time before it moved very slowly, as if to say we know your watching get a good look .When it started to leave our sight it did not co up it moved across the sky continuing in the s.Westerly direction we watched it until we could no longer see it ,we even stood on tipppy toes to keep it in sight until it was no more. when i say it ,i was sort of scared but more excited ,in fact i said no dont go i want to keep looking, my boy friend was kinda weirded out and told me to hush up. neither of us  can deny what we saw . we live near no army base ,nor do we live near any air ports in fact we live in the middle of the woods.
content.summary: I went out to call in my cat, it was dusk not many stars out yet ,my eyes were drawn to the s,west skies when i saw a glowy orange pillar shaped object

content.detailedDescription: I live in knoxville, tn and i was walking my 2 dogs for their morning constituitional at about 6:20am est, when i noticed how lovely the sky looked.  there were so many stars out.  i could see both the big dipper and little dipper.  it was a very clear morning.  then i notice 2 identical stars close to each other that were extremely bright.  i thought to myself that i had never seen those stars before.  as i continued to watch, they both began to fade until they were gone.  i thought maybe cloud cover was the problem, but none of the other stars faded.  the sky was almost cloudless.  it left me feeling extremely curious about what these were.
content.summary: 2 identical very brights stars next to each other faded away

content.detailedDescription:
I was in nampa for the night and was sitting out behind our trailer looking up at the sky with some friends. we were testing our knowledge of the sky, trying to one up each other with points of interest when we saw something moving toward the east in the part of the sky we were focusing on. 

one of my friends suggested it was a shooting star at first, but it wasn't moving fast enough and didn't burn out. the next decision was that it was probably a satellite, but as we continued to watch it started to make a large arc around the north-eastern portion of the sky and started heading south. it was making large arcs, at an impressive speed, so we had no idea how to classify it. 
we lost sight of the object when it became so faint in the southern sky we could no longer track it. 
it was definitely too high to be a plane, especially at the speed it was moving. it also seemed to have a minor pulse the entire time

it was a very interesting experience, and we are all a little stumped over here. we were all in awe, and left rather speechless by the event. it was a day or two before we talked about it again, but everyone agreed that we saw something that night. i supposed we're most interested to know if anyone else in that part of the country saw anything interesting in the sky around that time in august. 

-m
content.summary: Small star-like object taking moving quickly in random directions, over vast distances.

content.detailedDescription: I went outside for a cigarette. night sky was clear and visiblility was good, except a couple of small clouds.  behind this one cloud was an orange hue.  i thought it was the moon and thought it was strange-so i kept looking.  it started coming towards me, the shape changed, i realized it was not the moon, it looked like a burning plane.  though no sound was heard.  i kept on watching thinking it was going to crash and i was preparing myself to dial 911.  as it came closer to me, it took on a more rectanglular/square shape.  i was watching it for a few more seconds then went back in.  saw the prime time special on ufo's and didn't want to become an abduction eyewitness.  when i went inside, i watched from the window, the object went back in the direction it came and got smaller.  i went upstairs and woke up my husband.  by the time i convinced him to come downstairs and look, it was gone.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Went outside for a cigarette, night sky was clear and visible.  saw street light orange colored object, thought it was moon, got bigger as it came closer to me, changed shape, went inside. it went back the other way,and disappeared shortly after.

content.detailedDescription:
I would like to note this has been happening from august 30th 08 until this day of september26th 08.I i had took my dogs out for a walk  at my home 1437 bell brook and i looke d up in the sky and shaw tinkling lights from the north, east , west and south . so i decided to get the dogs in and just as i had my brother calls and says hey sis do you see those lights in the sky , i said yes he said he would be right over
so my neice my brother and sister -in-law and my neices boyfriend came over
. we all had binoculars so we went down the side walk to a empty feild by the hose and watched these objects that where dics shape , as we were doing that all of a sudden this thing apeared from no where it had red lights it went over all of us and it was so huge you could see a diamond shape on the belly
. it had no arplane sound at all and it dissappeared as quick as it had come
. a nd every since that night these disc shaped objects have been in the sky from all directions with red , blue or green lights  dancing around on them. t onight i wemt out and looked and there was at lest 5 out
 the slowly dissapear after a  while we are not ccrazy
 we have seen these i would swear on a bible
, w e were not scared we were like amazed at this big object that had went over us it was so huge ,we all beleive that there is something out there.
content.summary: There was a bright trinagular object that  came form nowhere it was so huge it went over my brother neice and sister in law it was tringular in shape with just red lights on it

content.detailedDescription:
Last night i was very upset, so i decided to stay in the park and not go home. (big trouble with room mates, but that's another story.) i sat down with laptop and tried to relax but i had the flu and i was sick. (you know, cold chills, sore throat...)

it was very cold. and it was getting dark fast. i was feeling worse by the minute, that cold weather would have seriously made me sicker... and then suddenly i knew i had to walk home to sleep. it wasn't really my choice... it was more like a warning. 'go home and sleep, you're sick.' not verbal, just ...Hard to explain, it was very stern, almost threatening. 

i got to the home about ten minutes later. door was jammed. (see above about room mates. lol ) i gave up and sat down outside in the cold again, on the driveway. in the cold.

it was while i was sitting on the driveway that i just happened to look up and there it was. at first i thought 'plane?' because it was dark and i saw the lights straight off. but instantly i knew it wasn't. i suddenly saw a ...For lack fo a better term... saucer shaped thing. no, more like two bowls glued together sort of shape. it had lights all around it and was coming out of the heavy clouds. it was also competely quiet.  it was not high up either.

i wasn't afraid when i first saw it. i knew it was looking for me. but i was emotionally strung up about the arguement with room mates and felt homesick, plus this ufo on top of things... so as soon as i realized it was looking for me, i panicked, i rang the house phone and made the room mate let me in, even if she was putting baby to bed. (i would have waited otherwise in the cold.)

we live under frequent air traffic. planes come and go all the time above us, quantus, virign mostly... and we can hear them, even when they're on the horizon, they are coming down to land at brisbane airport. this wasn't one of them. it was low, i could see the shape, it had no sound even so close.
it was not that hte wind blew the sound away- i'd watched several big airplanes just ten or twenty minutes ago. and this ufo was upwind, sound would have traveled to me,

anyway, as i got indoors, it passed over some houses about twenty metres away, heading for the park that i had been sitting at. like it was unsure where i was.

i would normally take pictures but i really wasn't in an emotional state to think about  that! 

but even with my panic, even though you' assume i'd sit with people... so i felt safer... i went to my room. on my own. shut the door, lay down, and fell asleep. i woke up at about 9:50pm... maybe... and felt so groggy, so out of it. i didn't feel fluish anymore, just really stunned and numb, like a lesser extent of what i felt like after general anesthetic. someone had been knocking on the door and i hadn't even heard them, i'd just gotten up for water and for panadol. and i couldn't bring myself to tell anyone about it till today. there was too much stuff going on last night to tell them.
content.summary: Saw a ufo crossing over.

content.detailedDescription:
Hello, 
for the second time, in the same location, i have seen ufo(s).  tonight it was different than 4 years ago.  it was approximately 7:50pm , thursday, september 25th, 2008.  while driving north on 93, just passing exit 24 (ashland, nh) to the left, between the south and north lanes almost to tree line height, there were three very bright red lights in the shape of a triangle. the distance between the lights must have been at least 30 ft.  it was very brief, just there, then not there. like it went disappeared.  the sky was not clear, so it was hard to see.  i looked for other crafts, ours or there's.  i always look for some sign of ufo's when i drive through there, which is every day & night.  since i saw the ufo about four years ago in the same spot. 
 
although it was a few months later in the year, the lights were white & yellow, allot smaller looking and there were several aircraft on the horizon, i mean allot of aircraft.  when i finally got home, i went onto my deck and looked at the skyline, you could still see several planes on the horizon.  i have never seen that many, hardly any to be exact.  there was definitely something that night four years ago.  i contacted a local ufo person and corresponded my sighting to him.  i have saved the emails, but they are at work.  i can be more exact when i find them and can give you exact dates and details.  
 
if you have heard of anyone else experiencing sightings like mine in my area, i would be interested in hearing the details.  i know i am not crazy, i saw something.  weather or not it is a true ufo, that i do not know.
 
attached pic is from your website, it is exactly what i saw.
content.summary: Three bright red lights in triangle shape

content.detailedDescription: This is the second time i have reported sighting this object and tonight was the most dramatic view ive had.While sitting on my front porch i saw two of these objects at different points in the sky but they appeared to be at the same altitude.After watching these for a while (30 mins)i went inside and when i returned i saw a third much lower and between the first two.This object was much brighter,like venus except for the clearly visible flashing multicolored lights.I watched all three with much interest determined to see if they changed position drastically or anything and my friends son came outside and called me.At this time i turned around for maybe two seconds and when i turned back around the third much brighter object had vanished and was nowhere to be seen.Surely more people have seen this.Was much disappointed not to see how it left or where it went.I have never been more convinced that somethings out there than i am right now.The objects were in the sky west of here and appeared to be about 2000 feet up and maybe 30 miles away although its hard to say for sure.These things appear to be very interested in this area.Once again if anyone else in the area has observed these please email me at gilawildman@yahoo.Com.
content.summary: Starlike object with flashing red,blue green,yellow and white lights

content.detailedDescription: I was looking outside my window at this weird cloud that was shaped like a disc. i just stared at it for like 3 minutes. then something can out of it it was flashing. i thought it was a plane. but planes have different colors flashing this one had only white. the it was headed east for like about a minute. its seed was medium. then it just disappeared. then 3 minutes later the weird cloud vanished. i don't know exact if it was an ufo but i am positive it was. when that happened i was like what is that i tried to get it in a picture but my camera couldn't get it somehow
content.summary: Look outside my window saw a weird shape cloud something popped out of it  flashing then dissappered

content.detailedDescription:
Wednesday night, sitting on my staircase outside using the phone i witnessed what initially looked to be 2 stars moving south in tandem over the course of 10-20 seconds. they were at a 75 degree angle from where i was moving directly away from me.  at first when i looked up, i thought that they were stationary and i had a split second to think that "those stars are really close together."--but were definitely moving  the lead 'star' was profoundly brighter than the back 'star' which remained at a constant dim or dull brightness.  over the next several seconds, the lead light dimmed to the same illumination of the light following.  they continued moving south and eventually were not visable anymore.
i live next to dfw airport and have for the last 5 years and what i saw was not a plane.  i'm estimating that these "tandem lights" were 20-40 feet in the air which would make the distance between each light tremendous in size.  the object or lights i witnessed were deliberate and was not a satellite, "shooting-star" or a plane.
content.summary: Saw what looked like 2 stars moving in tandem by dfw airport-not a plane

content.detailedDescription: I was leaving my girlfriends house around 1 am when i was putting my dog in the car and she started barking like she was mad at me. she then started to get nervous, so i shut the tail gate, and saw something at my 1 oclock flying around in the low clouds, it was red the lights didnt flash but they seemed to strobe in a fast circle, and it was making absolutley zero noise, it started moving slowly from side to side, and the next thing i know it just vanished, i waited for probably ten minutes for this thing to appear on the other side of the small cloud but it didn't, and i was sober. i believe in ufo's not as a alien space craft but government planes, but seeing how freaked out my large dog was im definitley convinced that it was weird.
content.summary: I was leaving my girlfriends house at 1am

content.detailedDescription: I was walking in the park this morning near my house, and as i approached the base ball field, a glint of light caught my attention as i was looking at the cloud formations.  i thought at first that it was just an airplane , but on further observation, noticed a couple of things. 1) it was way above the clouds, like maybe 60,000 feet, 2) had a brilliant glow when the sun would shine on it, and 3) appeared to be a little round ball with no wings. also as i watched it, it didnt seem to be moving along like a jet plane, but seemed to meander along as if it where being pulled or towed.  it had not wings, no contrail, and no noise. stayed on a n.E. to s.W heading and if i had to guess, i would say air speed to be around 1000 miles and hour, as it crossed my  field of vision in about four minutes, at an altitude of at least 60,000 ft. i have a feeling that i may have been looking at a satellite, but dont know if satellites can be seen in broad daylite, even with the sun reflecting of them, but this object did have a really high level of brightness when it would come from behind the clouds into the sunlite.  i guess if i go to the park at 11:00 am tommorrow and look up in the same spot ill see it again if in fact it was a satellite. anyway it dissapeared of to the southwest out of my field of vision, and just after that, i observed to jets moving in the same general direction behind it.
content.summary: Walking in park near home, flash of light up in the clouds caught my attention.  looked up to see small round object moving slowly across from n.E. to s.W.

content.detailedDescription:
Intensely bright unwinking light, moving at the speed and height of a commercial plane, heading east over aldermaston, the uk's nuclear weapons research facility fifteen miles away and on towards london and heathrow airport - fifty miles away.

the early night sky is full of planes at this hour, to and from london's heathrow and gatwick airports, with five or six planes' winking navigation lights visible in the dark sky at any one time.

this light was an incandescent white light, larger and brighter than the many stars, and travelled at speed cross the sky. through binoculars it sometimes had the appearance of a v-shape, and sometimes a crescent. it was high and silent, with no flashes of light, only a strong, steady brilliant white light, silently crossing the evening sky, on a different flight path to the many planes in the sky at this time.
content.summary: Bright unwinking light, moving at the speed and height of a commercial plane

content.detailedDescription: "wow!" is all i can say when i stare into the clouds over austin these days. cumulus clouds at the same altitude moving slowly toward each other in different directions, then merging into one cloud, plasma like appendages/tentacles slowly crawling out from each. human and alien faces with pupils and irises. dim shadows of equilateral triangles, squares. perfect circles cut out of the clouds. spirals. the clouds are friggin wierd, and i'm tired of being called psychotic for noticing it. here are some examples:
content.summary: Clouds don't do that! (well, now they do, and your psychotic to think that it was ever any other way).

content.detailedDescription:
Second time i think i've seen this.

appeared first as a dot...Almost as if a plane, on the western sky above the mountains west of boulder, colorado, just after sunset. 

could be a star...But no stars were visible to the east yet.

could be a plane...But stayed around for 10 - 15 minutes as it slowly lowered to the west and behind the trees/mountains.

could be a satellite???

when i focused in, was a ring with a dot inside of it. when i've blown up or darkened the image became much clearer.

saw a ring of lights (blue, red, white, other colors???) spinning around it when focusing. probably should have tried putting the camera (a little digital 7 megapixel lumix/panasonic on video mode to capture the lights, but didn't think about it and was trying for a good still image. when i "sharpen" the images i can see the lights, but they appear as small circles around the biggest concentric circle.

maybe it's the rings around saturn and saturn at sunset???

or who knows. i'm not going to try and be the judge...But enjoy.

(september 24, 2008, 7:14 pm, 60 degrees farenheit, just after sunset).
content.summary: Circle with lights spinning around it visible west of boulder, colorado for 15 minutes.

content.detailedDescription: We were in my parked car facing east waiting for the school bus. i saw a bright light moving south east. it was rather bright and moved like a plane. i was watching it trying to figure out what it was, when it began to flicker. it then became very bright and seemed to change colors and then it shot off straight east and disappeared. the sky was very clear. we could see the stars clearly, but there was no sign of it.
content.summary: Weird light

content.detailedDescription:
We were looking at the stars and saw what we thought was a shooting star.  it was traveling to the left of us at a high speed (shooting stars usually travel at high velocity from one point to another point and then disappear); it then moved in an inconceivable way, not like an airplane.  it traveled up and then it traveled down.  then it became brighter, and then it stopped moving.  the brightness started to dim and then it disappeared.  all this happened within a matter of 2 minutes.  it was amazing.  

i posted a sighting a few days ago about a star-like object radiating blue, green and red lights.  tonight, it was out again.  it was around 9:30pm and it was situated north of us, to the left of the big dipper, which i used as my guide.  about one hour later, this object was no longer where it was originally.  it was now east of us, situated to the right of the big dipper.  around 10:45pm, an object appeared below this "star-like object" which radiated a red glow.  it then traveled up, or north, and then disappeared.  i completely froze.  this was not an airplane, nor a star.  i stayed out there for about 5 minutes to see if i was wrong or if it would re-appear, but it never did.
content.summary: Star-like object flies horizontally, vertically, and then it disappears plus other sighting

content.detailedDescription:
My daughter, boyfriend our neighbor and i were standing on our porch at our home when my daughter pointed out something in the sky. we looked up in the sky and it looked like a very large fireball. it was extremely bright and was moving rather fast, but not as fast as an airplane. initially we thought it was a comet or meteor because of the fire-like appearance however it had no 'tail, and after about 30 seconds the flame faded out and we could clearly see a dark circular object slowing down. 

it continued southwest through the sky. the dark object then began to quickly descend. we were sure that it was going to crash at the speed it was traveling, and we waited to see some kind of smoke in the sky as a result of the crash, but nothing happened. if it did in fact land, it would have landed somewhere southwest of denver.

we've seen planes, weather balloons, blimps, helicopters...But nothing like this. every one of us was in shock because we just couldn't pinpoint what might look or move like this object.
content.summary: Large circular fireball, dark circle after fire faded; after about 30 seconds

content.detailedDescription:
i just got home from going to the store and was getting out of my car when i saw a flash of light in the sky. when i looked up i saw it was the sun reflecting off of an object. i wasn't sure what it was so i watched it to see if it was a plane or something else. the light only reflected of it for a few more seconds then i could see it long, and cylindrical. it was kind of grayish in color and appeared to be moving kind of slow for a plane. it was moving from the southwest to the northeast. just to the northwest of the object i could see a jet flying higher and faster in the opposite direction. i could hear no sound from either one and could see no exhaust trail from the object but i could see one from the jet.

  as the object moved closer and more in front of me i could see there were no visible wings. it was low enough that if there were any wings they should have been at least somewhat visible. at this time i went in the house to get my wife to look at it and when i came back outside i couldn't see it anymore. i took my groceries in and came back out and it was back but appeared to be farther away but i could still see it pretty good and then my wife got a look at it too and agreed that it didn't look like any plane that she had seen before. we continued to watch it until it disappeared in the distance. as it got farther away it looked like it was descending but that could've been because of the angle it was moving away at. as it disappeared there was another jet was coming from north of where i last saw the object. both jets were also military type jets, in this area were rarely see any commercial jets as the nearest major airport is 100 miles away in memphis, tn.

  i've never seen a ufo before but have always been interested in them and believe they exist, but i'm very objective when i look at things and if i had the slightest idea that this was a plane i would never report it. i'm 43 and this is the first time i can honestly say that i saw something in the sky that i couldn't explain. i'm not saying that it was aliens because it probably wasn't but i know it wasn't a plane, helicopter, blimp or anything like that.
content.summary: Slow moving cylindrical shaped object flying at low fairly low altitude.

content.detailedDescription: I was excersize walking w/my mom down the street at 10:25pm we noticed a glowing ball, orange in color heading west in a strait line at what appeared to me as approx 80 miles per hour. it made no noise and was bright orange in color, but easy to look at. it had no blinking lights on it as it traveled across the sky. it disappeared behind the trees and out of our sight.
content.summary: Bright orange glowing ball or orb. easy to look at. apprx 1000' in the air. traveling west at 80 mph.

content.detailedDescription:
I was at home august 25 2008 looking the sky, when i see a white sphere, this object was sometimes steady and sometimes moving side to side, up and down, i think it was more than 8,000 feet altitude, after 2 or 3 minutes heads to the east. it went to the clouds, suddenly the clouds open wide and then appears an alien face made from clouds.

i have the video but the resolution is low, this shows the right part of the alien face and has his left hand in front his face holding some circle object, the left thumb it���s under the object and 3 fingers above the object.

when this face appears in the clouds the white sphere disappears. and after 2 minutes the face disappears as well.
content.summary: I see an sphere in the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was standing with my neighbor ady in our back yard. i was showing her the planet jupiter with my binoculars while commenting to her on how well they worked since we could also see the moons surrounding the planet. at that moment ady asked me "what's the star next to it?". i said, "what star?" she said, "that star right there, the one that's moving." i replied, "the star isn't moving, maybe the cloud makes it appear to be moving." she handed me the binoculars and said, "it is moving look". i looked up at the star she was pointing at and it was a little to the right of jupiter(was at our 10 o'clock position) the star was moving north. there were no blinking lights and just looked like a regular star moving across. i looked at it with the binoculars and it looked like a gray dot. i put the binoculars down and ady asked, "is it supposed to move like that?". i told her,"no,it's not a shooting star". we watched moved from it's original starting point(by jupiter) at 10 o'clock to just over our heads into the 1 o'clock in just 5 to 8 seconds then disappeared into the coming ocean layer.There was no sound, no lights of any color, just a gray dot the size of a star. just after we saw and heard a jet  with it's flashing airplane lights coming from the southern direction and it went to the same area where we last saw this thing and it also disappeared into the marine layer. we could not explain what it was, this is just what happened.
content.summary: Star like ufo moved at rapid speed

content.detailedDescription:
Driving to hocky game w/ friend  in charleston sc on the 525.Look to my left see ufo, half mile away about 500 ft in air.... passing me ,i said,'wtf', my friend says just dont know never seen anything like that, i agreed.  it sped up, as did i. i was going about 90, it was bout 200...It gets about a mile ahead,  crosses parkway sharp 90degree turn, or it looked it, then behind blds on right now. when we cleared the blds , it was now just a speck, then...Up and gone. my friend says milatary.......I do not know.  it was fat disc w/ top and bottom peices....Pill box looking....Terrats looking .......Also,white and red lights, teather or pole w/ red light at the end lowers from belly then goes back up.....Clear day close up about the size of.....Hard to say, maby a   6000 sq ft. patio home. the object did not appear to be spinning.................. 
we were both amazed ,  but my friend quickly dismissed  the sighting and does'nt care to talk about.  only because he just dosent care. if it dosent make him money, what good is it,  that type of guy.  at the hokey game i told the friends we met there,  and my witness friend tells me to shut up.  hes is very funny though,  and a great friend.  he also dose'nt want to be "the ufo guy".  i dont care. i saw what i saw. but we (usa) are making huge leaps, and who knows what we really have.
content.summary: Driving on the 525 and look to see object.  clearly and close

content.detailedDescription: It was around june just this past summer i was out on my back patio cutting wood up with my electric saw when i happen to look up above the pine tree lines and i seen this big round fire ball and i can still see it in my mind of what it looked like i remember like sparks where coming off of it i ran in to the house yelling for my mom she came out back with me and when she saw it she right away said it was a ufo and it didn't make no noise it just floated over the west end of our town towards the front of my neighbors house so we ran out to the front of our porch and by the time we got out front it was gone i had made the report here on mufon a while back about it and after seeing that red ball me and my mom have been seeing ufo's just about every night through out the whole summer and i have met up with a friend from ohio who is also seeing them coming up out of the lake in east lake ohio and our government knows about them right along with the world of governments i believe we are being invaded and i know that  they are interested in our  source of energy because of what we are seeing with these objects is a energy that can be linked to earth well that's the conclusion we have come to and living under water can protect them from our viruses and germs being that their dna make up is different then ours they are coming up out of the water
content.summary: In responce to gary mayfield on the red fire ball over the cotton field

content.detailedDescription: I was maybe 16 years old playing basket ball with lots of other kids so i could not have been the only one that saw this thing. something caught my eye and i look up and tried to make sense of what i was looking at i first thought it was a helicopter but i did not hear the blades then i thought it was a plan but there was no sound and it stayed in one spot i could not take my attention away from this thing when i came back to my senses i had not realized that some time had passed it was like every thing around me continued and i was there but i wasn't and that the basketball court was full of kids and when i came out of looking at this thing all the kids were gone
content.summary: No sound lites all around it changing colors

content.detailedDescription: My father and my maternal grandfather were in a cotton trailer packing cotton.  i was on the ground beside the cotton trailer picking up cotton off of the ground and tossing it back in the trailer.  we all saw a red glowing or shimmering ball in the sky about 15 to 20 feet off of the ground floating in the air above the cotton field.  it scared me and i climbed up into the trailer with my father and grandfather as quickly as i could and then turned and looked at the ball again. it floated up about a foot and then floated down about a foot and then just popped out like turning off a light.  the ball was about 3 to 4 feet in diameter.  it was perfectly round in shape.  i later was told that another man about  a mile away also saw it and it scared him so bad that he stopped the cotton picker that he was driving and ran to the house.  please let me know if anyone else has ever seen anything like this .  my grandfather died about 10 years later but every once in a while he would jokingly ask me if i had seen the u f o again and smile or chuckle.    thanks,  gary mayfield
content.summary: It looked like a big red glowing ball in the sky.  just floating 20 feet off of the ground.

content.detailedDescription: For years now i have been witnessing various lights over the surrounding mountains of vegas. above the northern mountain, i constanly see bright amber colored lights appearing, hovering, moving and disappearing. at least 2-3 a week at various times throughout the evening and early morning. over the mount charleston, i see white and green lights appear flash, hover and disappear from time to tiime. i can tell it is above for sure because i can see the silhouette of the mt top at times, not only that but sometimes they are so bright that if there are clouds present, they illuminate the entire cloud with its glow! every time i see them i get goose bumps and chills even though i ve seen them a thousand times. note: i recently saw  a show on crafts in the sky and they are very similar to the lights that were seen over the mountains in phoenix.
content.summary: Amber colored lights appearing, hovering and disappearing in no particular order or pattern.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my husband seen 2 lights traveling up high in the sky together we seen the come from the south and going to the north they traveled like they were on a two lane highway one in the slow lane and one in the fast we watched till they were out of sight.
content.summary: Two light traveling together
